content-type.description: Input configuration and web form setup

input.name: headerText
input.label: Header
input.help-text: The header will be displayed just above the form.

input.name: submitText
input.label: Submit button-text
input.help-text: Customize the text of the select button if you want. Defaults to "Submit" in the browser language.

input.name: successMessage
input.label: Success message
input.help-text: Add an acknowledgment to show to the user when the form has been submitted successfully.

input.name: failureMessage
input.label: Failure message
input.help-text: Add an acknowledgment to show to the user if form submission fails

input.name: emailSubscribers
input.label: To
input.help-text: Optional. E-mail addresses specified in these fields will receive all the raw form response data in an e-mail, and with uploaded files as attachments.

input.name: emailFrom
input.label: From
input.help-text: Default address appearing in the e-mail's "from" line, example: "Customer Service" <noreply@example.com> â€¦or just an e-mail: noreply@example.com.

input.name: emailSubject
input.label: Subject
input.help-text: Is the form heading by default, but a custom e-mail subject may be specified here. If neither are filled out, the display name is used.

option-set.name: receipt
option-set.label: E-mail receipt back to user
option-set.help-text: For this to work, one of the Input Fields created above MUST be of type "e-mail" and be "required".

option.name: enabled
option.label: Yes, send receipt
option.help-text: For this to work, one of the Input Fields created above MUST be of type "e-mail" and be "required".

input.name: message
input.label: Receipt message
input.help-text: For this to work, one of the Input Fields created above MUST be of type "e-mail" and be "required".

input.name: includeFormData
input.label: Include summary of submitted form data
